feed.title: Docs Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docs: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

We can now overwrite Docs at runtime ! âœ¨ Some documentation about it here. ğŸ“œ We provided a css example in the pull request, you can check it here !

Added

  • ğŸš©(backend) add feature flag for the footer by @lunika #841
  • ğŸ”§(backend) add view to manage footer json by @lunika #841
  • âœ¨(frontend) add custom css style by @AntoLC #771
  • ğŸš©(frontend) conditionally render AI button only when feature is enabled by @rebeling #814

Changed

  • ğŸš¨(frontend) block button when creating doc by @AntoLC #749

Fixed

  • ğŸ›(back) validate document content in serializer by @lunika #822
  • ğŸ›(frontend) fix selection click past end of content by @AntoLC #840

Thanks to New Contributors

  • @berrydenhartog made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/821
  • @rebeling made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/814
  • @bfontaine made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/808

Full Changelog: https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Docs: v3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Thanks to Blocknotejs - Tables have gotten a huge overhaul, gaining some big new features along the way: - Merging & splitting cells - Cell background & text color - Cell text alignment - Table header rows & columns

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c52b335c-8864-478c-9ef0-4bfe33e89cd0

Added

  • ğŸš¸(backend) make document search on title accent-insensitive by @sampaccoud #874
  • ğŸš© add homepage feature flag by @AntoLC #861
  • âœ¨(settings) Allow configuring PKCE for the SSO by @Tom-Hubrecht #886
  • ğŸŒ(i18n) activate chinese and spanish languages by @virgile-dev #884
  • ğŸ”§(backend) allow overwriting the data directory by @mweinelt #893
  • â•(backend) add django-lasuite dependency by @qbey #839
  • âœ¨(frontend) advanced table features by @AntoLC #908

Changed

  • âš¡ï¸(frontend) reduce unblocking time for config by @AntoLC #867
  • â™»ï¸(frontend) bind UI with ability access by @AntoLC #900
  • â™»ï¸(frontend) use built-in Quote block by @AntoLC #908

Fixed

  • ğŸ›(nginx) fix 404 when accessing a doc by @AntoLC #866
  • ğŸ”’ï¸(drf) disable browsable HTML API renderer by @lunika #919
  • ğŸ”’(frontend) enhance file download security by @PanchoutNathan #889
  • ğŸ›(backend) race condition create doc by @AntoLC #633
  • ğŸ›(frontend) fix breaklines in custom blocks by @AntoLC #908

New Contributors

  • @olaurendeau made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/536
  • @Tom-Hubrecht made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/886
  • @mweinelt made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/893

Full Changelog: https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/compare/v3.1.0...v3.2.0

Full Blocknotejs Changelog: https://github.com/TypeCellOS/BlockNote/compare/v0.23.2...v0.29.1

entry.title: New release for Docs: v3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

âœ¨Docs has a fresh new design with a more generic approach.

âš™ï¸ The footer is now configurable!

See how to do here: https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/blob/main/docs/theming.md#footer-configuration-

ğŸ“œ The export feature is under the AGPL licence.

For more information, see: https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/blob/main/UPGRADE.md#330---2025-05-22

âœ¨ Add a custom callout block thanks to @ZouicheOmar

scrnli_Nx06lxyV6Ny6p0.webm

Added

  • âœ¨(backend) add endpoint checking media status by @lunika #984
  • âœ¨(backend) allow setting session cookie age via env var by @sampaccoud #977
  • âœ¨(backend) allow theme customization using a configuration file by @lunika #948
  • âœ¨(frontend) Add a custom callout block to the editor by @ZouicheOmar #892
  • ğŸš©(frontend) version MIT only by @AntoLC #911
  • âœ¨(backend) integrate maleware_detection from django-lasuite by @lunika #936
  • ğŸ—ï¸(frontend) Footer configurable by @AntoLC #959
  • ğŸ©º(CI) add lint spell mistakes by @AntoLC #954
  • âœ¨(frontend) create generic theme by @AntoLC #792
  • ğŸ›‚(frontend) block edition to not connected users by @AntoLC #945
  • ğŸš¸(frontend) Let loader during upload analyze by @AntoLC #984
  • ğŸš©(frontend) feature flag on blocking edition by @AntoLC #997

Changed

  • ğŸ“(frontend) Update documentation by @Zorin95670 #949
  • âœ…(frontend) Improve tests coverage by @Zorin95670 #949
  • â¬†ï¸(docker) upgrade backend image to python 3.13 by @lunika #973
  • â¬†ï¸(docker) upgrade node images to alpine 3.21 by @lunika #973

Fixed

  • ğŸ›(y-provider) increase JSON size limits for transcription conversion by @lebaudantoine #989

Removed

  • ğŸ”¥(back) remove footer endpoint by @lunika #948

New Contributors

  • @ZouicheOmar made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/892
  • @Zorin95670 made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/949

Full Changelog: https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/compare/v3.2.1...v3.3.0

entry.title: New release for Docs: v3.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

âœ¨Docs begins a new chapter with the launch of multipages!

Multi Pages - Docs.webm

Added

  • âœ¨(frontend) multi-pages by @PanchoutNathan #701
  • âœ¨(frontend) Duplicate a doc by @AntoLC #1078
  • âœ¨Ask for access by @AntoLC #1081
  • âœ¨(frontend) add customization for translations by @rvveber #857
  • âœ¨(backend) add ancestors links definitions to document abilities by @sampaccoud #846
  • âœ¨(backend) include ancestors accesses on document accesses list view by @sampaccoud # 846
  • âœ¨(backend) add ancestors links reach and role to document API by @sampaccoud #846
  • ğŸ“(project) add troubleshoot doc by @AntoLC #1066
  • ğŸ“(project) add system-requirement doc by @AntoLC #1066
  • ğŸ”§(front) configure x-frame-options to DENY in nginx conf by @lunika #1084
  • âœ¨(backend) allow to disable checking unsafe mimetype on attachment upload by @lunika #1099
  • âœ¨(doc) add documentation to install with compose by @unteem #855
  • âœ¨ Give priority to users connected to collaboration server (aka no websocket feature) by @lunika #1093

Changed

  • â™»ï¸(backend) stop requiring owner for non-root documents by @sampaccoud #846
  • â™»ï¸(backend) simplify roles by ranking them and return only the max role by @sampaccoud #846
  • ğŸ“Œ(yjs) stop pinning node to minor version on yjs docker image by @sampaccoud #1005
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»(docker) add .next to .dockerignore by @emersion #1055
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»(docker) handle frontend development images with docker compose by @lunika #1033
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»(docker) add y-provider config to development environment by @emersion #1057
  • âš¡ï¸(frontend) optimize document fetch error handling by @lebaudantoine #1089

Fixed

  • ğŸ›(backend) fix link definition select options linked to ancestors by @sampaccoud #846
  • ğŸ›(frontend) table of content disappearing by @AntoLC #982
  • ğŸ›(frontend) fix multiple EmojiPicker by @AntoLC #1012
  • ğŸ›(frontend) fix meta title by @AntoLC #1017
  • ğŸ”§(git) set LF line endings for all text files by @AntoLC #1032
  • ğŸ“(docs) minor fixes to docs/env.md
  • âœ¨support _FILE environment variables for secrets by @soyouzpanda #912

Removed

  • ğŸ”¥(frontend) remove Beta from logo by @AntoLC #1095

New Contributors

  • @Appryll made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/1042
  • @eduxstad made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/1075
  • @unteem made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/855
  • @StephanMeijer made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/1104
  • @soyouzpanda made their first contribution in https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/pull/912

Full Changelog: https://github.com/suitenumerique/docs/compare/v3.3.0...v3.4.0
